actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures containing 2,4,6-Tripropyl-1,3,5,2,4,6-trioxatriphosphinane 2,4,6-trioxide and organic solvents.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures containing 2,4,6-Tripropyl-1,3,5,2,4,6-trioxatriphosphinane 2,4,6-trioxide and organic solvents.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures containing 2,4,6-Tripropyl-1,3,5,2,4,6-trioxatriphosphinane 2,4,6-trioxide and organic solvents.
